message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. We can negotiate from here.
You could have done better than that, Alice. Let's try again!
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. No more lowball offers!
You're getting closer, but I'm not willing to give up that much yet!
I'm not budging much, Bob. You'll have to make a better offer if you want to get more.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about negotiating, Alice. I'm taking a firmer stance.
I'm not backing down, Bob. But I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. Don't expect any more favors.
You're not budging, I won't either. It's time to make a serious offer, Alice.
I'm not going to give in, Bob. But I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share. Don't expect any more generosity.
I'm not going to let you walk all over me, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to make another move.
I'm not going to let you have the majority, Alice. This is my last chance to get a decent share.
